title: A Brief History of Eviction Defense
itunes:title: A Brief History of Eviction Defense
description:
In the wake of the Supreme Court's shadow ruling to block the eviction moratorium and allow mass evictions to proceed, Robert, Chris, and Garrison discuss historical and contemporary eviction defense.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
